website_summaries.verdict: The perfect beginner's model for parents seeking a safe and reliable slide for their toddlers.
pros: Smaller, 10-foot construction makes a great size for younger children
Included slide is detachable and can be used with or without the runway
Vinyl material proves to be particularly durable
cons: A few owners had initial problems with shipping
Users do not slide very far

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. We have been outside playing with it almost everyday since it arrived. Even in days I don't hook up the hose to the slip and slide piece, the triad plays on the slide. When I unpackaged it, I was concerned a both durability since the slip and slide piece attaches to the slide with Velcro tabs. My concerns were unfounded and it is holding up great to daily use and being stored outside.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but they'll still have fun
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 and 4 year old and they don't go very far on the mat, only a few feet. They still love splashing around on it for a while. The piece that divides the water between the mat and slide is a little annoying as well. Vinyl mat seems fairly durable, but they've only used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Cor

customer_reviews.title: Great, but I only I on paid $20...
customer_reviews.text: So far we really like this slide. My 3 year old uses it and has a lot of fun. It sets up pretty easily and isn’t too hard to break down. This was listed for $49 but Amazon had one w a damaged box for $20 so that’s what we got it for. I do think at $49 it seems overpriced, $35 seems more reasonable. They should sell the ground runner and hose as a kit for ppl who already have the slide. We also have the Little Tykes red and blue slide. Other than color their identical.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie From the Block

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Had it up for about an hour- kids love it. Even if it only lasts a day- the slide is good enough to make it worth the money- then I could get a new slip n slide if it rips. Also- the reviews mention the handles falling off- you just need to read carefully which way to put them on so they snap in place. The directions explain it well- but I can see how some people might miss that step.

customer_reviews.title: Endless fun.

customer_reviews.title: Love this combo, many ways to
customer_reviews.text: This slide combo is adorable! This is the second summer my granddaughter has used it. This year she’s two. She uses the slide all year round inside and out. We hook the water slide part up on hot days and she loves it. The animals on the plastic are cute and vibrant; they have not faded at all. The sprinkler slide attaches easily to the yellow part of the slide and hose. I hang it over the line to dry and fold it after play. I leave the plastic slide out in the yard for dry play and sometimes put it onto the toddler pool for her to slide into.

customer_reviews.title: slide is too steep!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cute graphics, the easy assembly and storage, and especially how well the water squirts out from the mat. However, I am not going to use this product with my grandkids (ages 1-3) because the sliding board is too steep! When the children go down the slide, their butts hit the ground suddenly and very hard - like slamming on the brakes - and then they aren't able to slide down the mat. It looks like a lot of fun. My dare-devil grandson couldn't wait to go down the slide, but after the spine-jarring landing I couldn't get him to go down it again. Maybe next summer??

customer_reviews.title: Some Design Flaws

There is a hose which clips onto slide which in theory should supply water to the slide however water cannot travel vertical and the slide stays dry. The product is not a total loss and my daughter has enjoyed hours on the slide. There is some work to do on the design in order to improve quality.

The nice thing about little tikes is they hold their value pretty well when selling at a garage sale or they are always in great shape when handed down to younger cousins. product_meta.title: Little Tikes Wet & Dry First Slide
product_meta.description: Transform your backyard into a waterpark with Little Tikes! When the weather gets hot, your kids can cool off in a fun way by zooming down this water slide and slip mat. When the weather gets cooler, the slide works perfectly without water, too! Product Features: • Includes a yellow Little Tikes First Slide • 10-foot sea-creature vinyl slip mat to attaches to slide • Hose attachment sprays water on slide and slip mat • Slide can be used with or without water • Slide folds down without tools for compact storage and moving • Handrails snap into place on slide • Ages: 2+ years
feature_bullets: Toddler slide with 10-foot vinyl slip mat attachment for water play fun
Slide can be used with or without water slip mat
Attach hose to spray water on the slip mat
Perfect beginner's slide, sized especially for younger kids
